entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Tests: Spawn MonoProxy in a separate process to avoid excessive memory usage for tests #95488
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.HttpClient always fails on first attempted connection #95487
  • [wasm] Add WasmSingleFileBundle for browser-wasm projects too #95480
    9.0.0
  • Add ILStrip+wasm_opt pass when using WasmSingleFileBundle #95478
    9.0.0
  • Add a way to resolve IDictionary<,> from keyed service #95476
  • System.Runtime.Loader.*.Tests Fail Saying There is no .NET Found when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #95474
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, SoftHypen is not ignored when it should be #95473
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #95471
    9.0.0
  • Register a custom crash handler #95461
    9.0.0
  • The character filter in HTTP StatusDescription is incorrect or there is a problem with the language pack. #95454
  • [browser][doc] how to start dotnet on WebWorker + demo #95452
    9.0.0
  • StrConv("text",VbStrConv.ProperCase) causes a confusing error error #95451
  • System.IO.Compression.SubReadStream Read Makes Unnecessary Calls #95450
  • build runtime faild Failed to build "CoreCLR component". #95449
  • [API Proposal]: Add multipart/related to `MediaTypeNames.Multipart` #95446
    Future
  • `TotalAvailableMemoryBytes` should not be negative in a Wasm process #95440
    9.0.0
  • System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save(Stream stream) can not suppport .NET8 #95448
  • Run single test using docker image #95436
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlcollect/dlcollect.sh #95434
  • [wasm] EmccCompile, and MonoAOTCompiler should explicitly use `IBuildEngine9.ReleaseCores` #95431
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] `EmitBundle*` task should handle incremental builds #95430
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm] Windows: Failure to build browser, mono+libs with clean build of the runtime #94106
    9.0.0
  • AOT Native DLL with exported function name of "free" fails when using HttpClient #95421
    9.0.0
  • Build crashes in System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationGuard #92007
    8.0.x
  • How to pass a string to a profiler with DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute present #95442
  • Missing .NET Framework 4.8.1 source code #95475
  • Document Networking metrics #90663
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT: System.TypeLoadException : The type 'AudioToolbox.MidiRawData' cannot be found in assembly ... #95444
  • Enforcement too strict on Brotli Compression Level Enum #95455
  • [API Proposal]: Allow method built with an AsyncMethodBuilder to return something else than T #95472
  • Exception when doing snapshot in OnPaintSurface #94229
    9.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo.StandardName empty when run under ubuntu-latest NET 8, while value present with NET 6 #95213
    8.0.x
  • DateTime.Parse exception missing input value in .NET 8 #95331
    8.0.x
  • DateTimeOffset parsing methods do not support ISO8061 "basic format" #95458
  • Read JObject Property: System.Security.VerificationException: Operation could destabilize the runtime #95445
  • IJsonTypeInfoResolver change in behavior? #95438
  • [HTTP3] [outerloop] Requesting HTTP version 3.0 with version policy RequestVersionExact while unable to establish HTTP/3 connection #95413
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource` fails #91552
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `CancellationTokenRegistration_DisposeAsyncWhileCallbackRunning_WaitsForCallbackToComplete` fails #91577
    9.0.0
  • JSON parsing way to difficult #95453
  • JIT: Widespread jitstress failures with "Assertion failed 'node->OperIsLIR()'" #95388
    9.0.0
  • FileStream(path, FileMode.Open) trying to create file #95447
  • [browser] mono runtime already exited with 0 #89425
    9.0.0
  • STJ source generator fails due to 260 character path length limit on Windows (with EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles=true) #93111
    Future
  • int.TryParse has ambiguous #94422
  • Process crash on simultaneous call of EventListener.DisposeOnShutdown() and EventListener.EnableEvents() #84091
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Wasm runtime features #95486
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Force inline small BasicBlock methods #95484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] WS & HTTP clients more async #95483
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move generic parameter analysis to dataflow #95482
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Add X0 field init at capture context. #95470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono][WIP] Try not fall back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Added ARM64 SVE_GA_2A encoding #95435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to the 'locker' GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #95432
    area-Meta, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Add PropertyBuilder implementation #95303
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [wasi] Simplify, and clean up target for bundled resource generation #95426
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Enable jump-to-next removal optimization in MinOpts #95340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix emission of runtime invoke wrappers. #95468
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [workloads] Fix the condition for the workload metrics #95424
    area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95350
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Pin the Alpine Arm32 image to previous tag (#94683)" #95410
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure metadata for the type hierarchy is preserved #95457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Correct time zone name creation when generated lazily. #95364
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [libs] Remove test data duplicates #95462
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, test-enhancement
  • Fix FormatException message argument #95356
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • Switch PortableAppActivation tests to pre-built test asset #95441
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (3/N) #95306
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Throw OperationCanceledException with correct CancellationToken during QuicConnection cancellation #95459
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95325
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • Clean up GT_NOP #95353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused FindResourceDuplicates.ps1 script #95412
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove _monoAotBuildshCommand and _monoAotCrossCompileArg from pipelines #95416
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Free the tls memory on thread termination #95439
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Free the tls memory on thread termination #95362
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix MacOS arm64 assert in createdump #95433
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [8.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 8.0 branch #95423
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [7.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 7.0 branch #95422
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.x

Updated

  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Support VMR cross arch build #95425
    needs-area-label
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make GetKeyedServices(KeyedService.AnyKey) return all services #95308
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, needs-author-action, os-wasi
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Determine cross based on OS in addition to arch #95312
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update test runs to use Alpine 3.16 #95373
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
